attributes.action: Confiscate all assets held partially or wholly by Russian citizens within the UK
attributes.additional_details: The current and proposed sanctions against Russia from the UK are weak, ineffective, and inefficient. A strong message such as this will also deter other potential aggressive nations (e.g. China) from taking similar military actions against their sovereign neighbours.
attributes.background: If sanctions are the way forward, then the only true response to the Russian invasion of Ukraine is to force forfeiture of all Russian-owned or partly-owned assets, property, businesses, holdings or interests to be held by the UK government.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609428
